pullrequest.title: Better versioning in the model database

content.raw:
I'm guessing the Version has the format `a.b.c.d`, correct? Where `a` is major and it goes down from there.

In this case, if this is `2.2.2.2` and `otherVersion` is `0.3.0.0`, r will be true because this `b` is less than other `b`, which is not what we want, right?

What do you think of adding a few unit tests?
content.html:
I'm guessing the Version has the format a.b.c.d, correct? Where a is major and it goes down from there.

In this case, if this is 2.2.2.2 and otherVersion is 0.3.0.0, r will be true because this b is less than other b, which is not what we want, right?

What do you think of adding a few unit tests?
